task.title: Changing the version of a facet
task.shortdesc: You can change the version of a facet in a J2EE project by editing the facets for the project.

context.p: Changing the Java compiler version of a J2EE project involves changing the version of the Java facet. See .

step.cmd: In the Project Explorer view, right-click the project and then click Properties.
In the Properties window, click Project Facets.
step.stepresult: The Project Facets page lists the facets in the project.

step.cmd: In the Add/Remove Project Facets window, click the facet you want to change to select it.
Select the version of the facet from the drop-down box next to the facet's name.
